<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A getter for [[setWaypointVisible]] command.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Returns '''0''' ([[Number]]) instead of [[Boolean]]ean for an invalid waypoint</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''waypointVisible''' waypoint

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_visible <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[waypointVisible]] [groupOne, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_visible <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[waypointVisible]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[group]] [[player]], [[currentWaypoint]] [[group]] [[player]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[setWaypointVisible]]
</value></part></template>
